prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing sympathy greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "A heart feast condolence card for my sister who had to put her cat down Mimzey who she was a faithful, loving companion for 17 years.  She went everywhere with her in the end. She was in a lot of pain and had to go. She made the right decision by letting her go, but it still hurts. I want to write a card that will make her feel warm in love and good memories of beautiful Mimzey."
Style: ‚ú® Smart Style
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Teresa
From: Christina 
Message: "Dearest Teresa,
My heart is aching for you and the loss of your beautiful Mimzey. You gave her seventeen wonderful years of love, and in the end, you gave her the most compassionate gift of all by letting her go peacefully. She was so lucky to have you as her person, and her sweet memory will live on in our hearts forever.
Sending you all my love,
Christina"

Reference: "Use actual photo uploaded "

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way






- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "sympathy" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration style. The scene is bathed in a warm, ethereal glow, with soft, blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue creating a peaceful, heavenly atmosphere. The illustration depicts a stylized, beautiful memory of Mimzey, not in pain, but curled up peacefully on a soft, fluffy cloud, surrounded by delicate, glowing stars and subtle, translucent flower petals drifting by. The linework is soft and flowing, done in colored pencil to add texture and a handcrafted feel, avoiding any harsh black outlines. The focus is on capturing Mimzey's sweet essence and the feeling of her being at peace, creating a tender, heartfelt image that honors her memory and offers comfort, like a warm, loving hug in a card.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a sympathy card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration style. The scene is bathed in a warm, ethereal glow, with soft, blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue creating a peaceful, heavenly atmosphere. The illustration depicts a stylized, beautiful memory of Mimzey, not in pain, but curled up peacefully on a soft, fluffy cloud, surrounded by delicate, glowing stars and subtle, translucent flower petals drifting by. The linework is soft and flowing, done in colored pencil to add texture and a handcrafted feel, avoiding any harsh black outlines. The focus is on capturing Mimzey's sweet essence and the feeling of her being at peace, creating a tender, heartfelt image that honors her memory and offers comfort, like a warm, loving hug in a card.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Dearest Teresa,
My heart is aching for you and the loss of your beautiful Mimzey. You gave her seventeen wonderful years of love, and in the end, you gave her the most compassionate gift of all by letting her go peacefully. She was so lucky to have you as her person, and her sweet memory will live on in our hearts forever.
Sending you all my love,
Christina" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in a gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration style. The scene is bathed in a warm, ethereal glow, with soft, blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue creating a peaceful, heavenly atmosphere. The illustration depicts a stylized, beautiful memory of Mimzey, not in pain, but curled up peacefully on a soft, fluffy cloud, surrounded by delicate, glowing stars and subtle, translucent flower petals drifting by. The linework is soft and flowing, done in colored pencil to add texture and a handcrafted feel, avoiding any harsh black outlines. The focus is on capturing Mimzey's sweet essence and the feeling of her being at peace, creating a tender, heartfelt image that honors her memory and offers comfort, like a warm, loving hug in a card.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration style. The scene is bathed in a warm, ethereal glow, with soft, blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue creating a peaceful, heavenly atmosphere. The illustration depicts a stylized, beautiful memory of Mimzey, not in pain, but curled up peacefully on a soft, fluffy cloud, surrounded by delicate, glowing stars and subtle, translucent flower petals drifting by. The linework is soft and flowing, done in colored pencil to add texture and a handcrafted feel, avoiding any harsh black outlines. The focus is on capturing Mimzey's sweet essence and the feeling of her being at peace, creating a tender, heartfelt image that honors her memory and offers comfort, like a warm, loving hug in a card.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a sympathy greeting card with a deeply warm and comforting, yet serene, artistic style. The artwork is rendered in a highly detailed, textured, and painterly digital art style that evokes a sense of gentle realism combined with magical, ethereal elements. The color palette is rich and earthy, dominated by deep browns, warm golden yellows, and hints of muted orange and cream, creating an intimate and cozy atmosphere. The main subject is a beautiful, contented tabby cat with striking green eyes, depicted in a relaxed, resting pose. The cat is positioned centrally, nestled within plush, soft textures that suggest a luxurious, comfortable setting. Behind the cat, a prominent, glowing, crescent moon shape, rendered with intricate, luminous golden patterns and radiating a soft light, acts as a gentle halo or backdrop. The background is a deep, starry night sky, subtly textured and dark, providing a stark yet harmonious contrast to the warm central elements. The text \"Sympathy\" is elegantly scripted in a delicate, flowing, golden cursive font, positioned at the top center of the card, safely away from the edges. The overall mood is one of peaceful remembrance and gentle affection, like a warm, loving embrace.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a sympathy greeting card featuring a subtly minimalist and serene decorative design that complements the front cover's theme. The artistic style remains painterly and textured, echoing the warm, earthy color palette of browns and muted golds. The main visual elements are soft, flowing textures suggestive of the plush bedding from the front cover, possibly a stylized rendition of a soft blanket or fur. Integrated subtly within these textures are delicate, abstract golden swirls or faint star-like speckles, hinting at the celestial elements from the front. There are no prominent figures or text on this back cover, but the overall impression is one of gentle closure and quiet reflection. The design is concentrated towards the center and left side, leaving the bottom-right corner completely clear and undecorated, approximately a 1-inch square, intended for a QR code. The mood is peaceful and understated, offering a sense of quiet continuity with the card's heartfelt message.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a sympathy greeting card, continuing the warm, ethereal, and comforting theme. The artistic style is a dreamy blend of watercolor and colored pencil illustration, characterized by soft, blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue, creating a heavenly, peaceful atmosphere. The scene depicts a stylized, tranquil memory of the beloved pet, not in a state of pain, but peacefully resting curled up on a soft, fluffy cloud. This cloud is adorned with delicate, glowing stars and translucent flower petals drifting gently around it, suggesting a serene, spiritual resting place. The linework is soft and flowing, achieved with colored pencils to add subtle texture and a handcrafted feel, intentionally avoiding harsh black outlines. The focus is on capturing the sweet essence of the pet and the feeling of ultimate peace, evoking a sense of comfort and a warm, loving hug. There is no text or prominent figures on this page, allowing the visual narrative of peaceful transition to unfold.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a sympathy greeting card, presenting the emotional core of the message with a harmonious blend of heartfelt text and sophisticated, innovative artwork. The artistic style is consistent with the gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration seen on the other pages, bathed in a warm, ethereal glow with soft, blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue. The scene is a continuation of the peaceful imagery, perhaps showing a stylized, serene memory of the pet on a soft cloud, surrounded by gentle light and drifting petals. The text, \"Dearest Teresa, My heart is aching for you and the loss of your beautiful Mimzey. You gave her seventeen wonderful years of love, and in the end, you gave her the most compassionate gift of all by letting her go peacefully. She was so lucky to have you as her person, and her sweet memory will live on in our hearts forever. Sending you all my love, Christina\", is presented in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script. This handwriting has an elegant, personal, and genuine feel, with a nice pen-style appearance, natural ink flow, and slight variations in line weight, like sophisticated yet approachable calligraphy. The text is integrated seamlessly into innovative decorative artwork that frames it without being clich√©, enhancing the emotional impact. The entire composition aims to convey a sincere and emotional tone, offering comfort and celebrating the pet's memory. No people are depicted in this scene."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a sympathy greeting card, featuring a dark navy blue background. The style is a gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration, maintaining the warm, ethereal glow with soft blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue. Scattered across the upper right portion of the card are a few simple, stylized stars in soft pink and pale blue. A delicate, flowing white line, suggesting a gentle sweep or trail, curves from the lower left towards the center. The overall composition is minimalist and serene, providing a peaceful and subtle closure to the card's visual story. The bottom-right corner, approximately 1 inch square, is intentionally left clear for a QR code. The artistic elements are kept subtle, focusing on a sense of quiet beauty and consistent with the comforting and heartfelt tone established in the preceding panels.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a sympathy greeting card, 9:16 ratio, in a gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration style. The scene is bathed in a warm, ethereal glow, with soft, blended colors of peach, lavender, and sky blue creating a peaceful, heavenly atmosphere. The illustration depicts a stylized, beautiful memory of Mimzey, not in pain, but curled up peacefully on a soft, fluffy cloud, surrounded by delicate, glowing stars and subtle, translucent flower petals drifting by. The linework is soft and flowing, done in colored pencil to add texture and a handcrafted feel, avoiding any harsh black outlines. The focus is on capturing Mimzey's sweet essence and the feeling of her being at peace, creating a tender, heartfelt image that honors her memory and offers comfort, like a warm, loving hug in a card. The overall composition features a central, stylized tree with golden branches and roots, its canopy filled with gently glowing orbs in varying shades of warm orange and soft pink, resembling lanterns or stars. These orbs are scattered throughout the upper portion of the image, with some falling away like gentle embers. The background is a deep, textured navy blue, speckled with tiny, softly glowing golden stars. The artistic style is flat 2D artwork, with full-bleed background extending to the edges. The linework of the tree is delicate and shimmering, suggesting a magical, celestial quality. The overall mood is one of serene remembrance and quiet comfort.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a sympathy greeting card designed for message space with a dark, deep navy blue background. The message text, "Dearest Teresa, My heart is aching for you and the loss of your beautiful Mimzey. You gave her seventeen wonderful years of love, and in the end, you gave her the most compassionate gift of all by letting her go peacefully. She was so lucky to have you as her person, and her sweet memory will live on in our hearts forever. Sending you all my love, Christina", is written in a beautiful, elegant, flowing golden cursive script. The script is legible and has a natural, warm character, mimicking a sophisticated pen style with subtle variations in line weight. The message is centrally positioned, allowing ample space for readability. Framing the text, a delicate, artistic decoration of glowing, warm golden orbs of light are arranged in a gentle, sweeping curve from the top left, cascading down towards the bottom right. These orbs are of varying sizes, with soft, ethereal halos, creating a dreamy, comforting atmosphere. Thin, subtle golden threads connect some of these orbs, adding to the magical, starlike quality. The overall design is minimalist yet impactful, using light and color to create an emotional resonance without overwhelming the message. The style is a gentle and dreamlike watercolor and colored pencil illustration, with soft, blended colors and avoiding harsh outlines. The focus is on capturing a feeling of peace and enduring love, like a warm, loving hug in a card.
